info.name: PlayAsport Academy API
info.description: Complete API collection for PlayAsport Academy backend - includes Authentication, Booking, Payment, Academy Management, Student Management, Participants, Locations, and more

request.description: Get booking summary including batch details (now returns center logo, address, experience), participant info (with age), and calculated amount before creating an order.
Create a Razorpay payment order and booking record. Returns booking details and Razorpay order information.
Verify Razorpay payment signature and update booking status. Use this after successful payment on frontend.
Cancel a booking order and mark payment status as failed. Only works for orders with pending payment status. Cannot cancel orders with successful payment.

query.description: Filter by booking status (pending, confirmed, cancelled, completed)
Filter by payment status (pending, processing, success, failed, refunded, cancelled)

request.description: Retrieve a paginated list of user's bookings with enrolled batches, participants, and payment details. Shows all batches the user has enrolled in. Requires authentication.

response.name: Success - User Bookings List

request.description: Webhook endpoint for Razorpay payment events. Automatically verifies payments and updates booking status. Called by Razorpay when payment events occur.

item.name: Academy Auth

request.description: Register a new academy user with OTP verification. Returns access token (15 minutes) and device-specific refresh token.
Login academy user and receive access/refresh tokens. Save the accessToken from response.
Authenticate or auto-register academy users using Firebase ID token (Google, Facebook, Apple, etc.)
Send OTP to academy user's email for verification
Verify OTP for academy user
Get current authenticated academy user details. Requires ACADEMY role.
Update academy user profile. Requires ACADEMY role.
Update academy user address. Requires ACADEMY role.
Change academy user password. Requires ACADEMY role.
Request password reset for academy user
Verify OTP and reset password for academy user
Refresh access token using refresh token
Logout current device. Requires ACADEMY role.
Logout from all devices. Requires ACADEMY role.

item.description: Academy authentication and user management endpoints

item.name: User Auth

request.description:
Register a new user (student or guardian) with temporary token verification.

**New Registration Flow:**
1. User sends OTP to mobile number via `/user/auth/send-otp` (mode='login')
2. User verifies OTP via `/user/auth/verify-otp` (mode='login')
3. If user doesn't exist, API returns `needsRegistration: true` and `tempToken` (valid for 30 minutes)
4. User completes registration with `tempToken` (instead of OTP)

**Note:** Password is NOT required. Mobile number is extracted from tempToken for security. Returns access token (15 minutes) and device-specific refresh token.
Authenticate or auto-register users using Firebase ID token (Google, Facebook, Apple, etc.)

Send OTP to mobile number for login or registration.

**For login mode:** Works for both existing and non-existing users. If user doesn't exist, they will receive a temporary registration token after OTP verification.

**Modes:**
- `login`: Works for both existing and non-existing users (default)
- `register`: For explicit registration flow
- `profile_update`: For profile update verification
- `forgot_password`: For password reset

Verify OTP sent to mobile number.

**For login mode:**
- If user exists: Returns user data with access and refresh tokens (login successful)
- If user doesn't exist: Returns `needsRegistration: true` and `tempToken` (valid for 30 minutes) for registration

**Response Examples:**

**User exists (login successful):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Login successful",
  "data": {
    "user": {...},
    "accessToken": "...",
    "refreshToken": "..."
  }
}
```

**User doesn't exist (registration required):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "OTP verified. Please complete registration.",
  "data": {
    "needsRegistration": true,
    "tempToken": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..."
  }
}
```
Get current authenticated user details. Requires authentication.
Update user profile. Requires authentication.
Update user address. Requires authentication.
Change user password. Requires authentication.
Update user's favorite sports. Array of Sport ObjectIds. Requires authentication.
Refresh access token using refresh token
Logout current device. Requires authentication.
Logout from all devices. Requires authentication.

item.description: User authentication and profile management endpoints

item.name: Academy

query.description: Number of records per page (default: 10, max: 100)

request.description: Get all published academies with pagination. If location (latitude, longitude) is provided, academies are sorted by distance (nearest first). If user is logged in and has favorite sports, academies with favorite sports are prioritized. This is an unprotected route (authentication is optional).

variable.description: Academy identifier. Supports: CoachingCenter UUID (id field), MongoDB ObjectId (_id), or User custom ID (academy owner's user ID)

request.description: Get detailed information about an academy including all batches. Supports multiple ID types: 1) CoachingCenter UUID (id field) - e.g., "784d4s4447444s5s44s4s4s4s4s4s4s4s78", 2) MongoDB ObjectId (_id) - e.g., "693bc2d1d0b08eea0c31cc53", 3) User custom ID - searches by academy owner's user ID. If user is not logged in, email and mobile number will be masked. This is an unprotected route (authentication is optional).

query.description: Number of records per page (default: 10, max: 100)

request.description: Get list of academies in a specific city. This is an unprotected route.

query.description: Number of records per page (default: 10, max: 100)

request.description: Get academies that offer a specific sport. If location (latitude, longitude) is provided, academies are sorted by distance (nearest first) and distance is shown in km. This is an unprotected route (authentication is optional).

item.description: Public academy endpoints for browsing and searching academies

request.description: Get home page data including nearby academies (up to 12, sorted by distance) and 8 popular sports. If location (latitude, longitude) is provided, nearby academies are shown. If user is logged in and has favorite sports, academies with favorite sports are prioritized. This is an unprotected route (authentication is optional).
Create a new participant. Users can only create participants for themselves. Requires authentication.
Get all participants for the authenticated user. Requires authentication.
Get participant by ID. Requires authentication.
Update participant. Requires authentication.
Delete participant (soft delete). Requires authentication.

item.name: Location

request.description: Get all countries. Public endpoint.
Get states by country code. Public endpoint.
Get cities by state. Public endpoint.

Get top 15 cities with academy and sports counts. Returns cities sorted by number of active academies. Shows city name, state name, academy count, and unique sports count for each city. Public endpoint.

item.description: Location endpoints for countries, states, cities, and top cities

request.description: Get all sports. Public endpoint.
Get all facilities. Public endpoint.

request.description: Get current locale setting. Public endpoint.

Health check endpoint. Returns server status and timestamp.
Get all roles. Requires authentication.

item.name: Academy Management

request.description: Create a new coaching center. Requires ACADEMY role.
Get all coaching centers for the authenticated academy user. Requires ACADEMY role.
Get coaching center by ID. Requires ACADEMY role.
Update coaching center. Requires ACADEMY role. Note: allowed_genders, allowed_disabled, is_only_for_disabled, and experience are required fields.
Update coaching center status (draft, published, suspended). Requires ACADEMY role.
Delete coaching center (soft delete). Requires ACADEMY role.
Create a new employee. Requires ACADEMY role.
Get all employees for the authenticated academy user. Requires ACADEMY role.
Get employee by ID. Requires ACADEMY role.
Update employee. Requires ACADEMY role.
Update employee active status. Requires ACADEMY role.
Delete employee (soft delete). Requires ACADEMY role.
Create a new batch. Requires ACADEMY role.
Get all batches for the authenticated academy user. Requires ACADEMY role.
Get batch by ID. Requires ACADEMY role.
Update batch. Requires ACADEMY role.
Update batch status. Requires ACADEMY role.
Delete batch (soft delete). Requires ACADEMY role.
Get all fee type configurations. Requires ACADEMY role.

item.name: Get Fee Type Config by ID

request.description: Get fee type configuration by ID. Requires ACADEMY role.

item.name: Academy Booking

query.description: Filter by booking status (pending, confirmed, cancelled, completed)
Filter by payment status (pending, processing, success, failed, refunded, cancelled)

request.description:
Retrieve a paginated list of bookings for coaching centers owned by the authenticated academy user. Requires authentication and ACADEMY role.

Returns simplified booking information including:
- booking_id: Unique booking reference ID (BK-YYYY-NNNN format)
- user_name: Full name of the user
- student_name: Participant name(s) - comma-separated if multiple
- batch_name: Name of the batch
- center_name: Name of the coaching center
- amount: Total booking amount
- payment_status: Payment status
- payment_method: Payment method used (card, netbanking, upi, etc.)
- invoice_id: Razorpay order ID (invoice reference)

response.name: Success - Bookings List

request.description: Retrieve a booking by its ID. The booking must belong to one of the academy's coaching centers. Requires authentication and ACADEMY role.
Update the status of a booking. The booking must belong to one of the academy's coaching centers. Status values: pending, confirmed, cancelled, completed. Requires authentication and ACADEMY role.

item.description: Academy booking management endpoints for viewing and managing bookings

item.name: Academy Student

query.description: Filter by overall student status (active, left, completed, pending)

request.description: Retrieve a paginated list of enrolled students grouped by participant (no duplicates). Shows student details including current age (calculated from DOB), batch name, sport name, booking status, and payment status for each enrollment. Requires authentication and ACADEMY role.

Retrieve comprehensive details about a specific enrolled student including all participant information (with age), complete user details, all batches with full batch information (scheduled timings, duration, capacity, fee structure), sport details, coaching center basic information (name, contact, location), and complete booking details (status, payment info, notes, timestamps). Requires authentication and ACADEMY role.

item.description: Academy student management endpoints for viewing enrolled students
Academy management endpoints for booking and student management. Requires ACADEMY role authentication.

item.name: Reels

request.description: Retrieve a paginated list of approved reels with video processing completed. Only returns reels from active users. Maximum 3 reels per page.

item.name: Get Reels List with ID First

request.description: Retrieve a list of reels where the specified reel appears first, followed by 2 more reels (total 3). Only returns reels from active users with video processing completed.

item.description: Public endpoints for viewing reels. Returns only approved reels with completed video processing from active users.
